subjectArea.name: CX - Opportunity Revenue Line
subjectArea.description: The data is sourced from CX Sales and this subject area provides information on all the Opportunity Revenue Lines created in the system and the associated Account, Opportunity Owner, Lead, Campaign, Contact, Competitor, and Partner. The associated objects refer to the primary association only e.g. Primary Contact, Primary Partner, Primary Competitor.
subjectArea.implicitFactColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.# of Raw Opportunity Revenue Lines
